website_summaries.verdict: Great if you're looking for a good amount of omega-3s for a nice price.
pros: A daily dose of this fish oil will give you 1,080 mg of omega-3 fatty acids
Although they do not have a "burpless" coating, many buyers say they do not experience fishy burps with this brand
cons: The daily dose is three softgels instead of two like many other brands
Some buyers complain they are difficult to swallow and have a fishy aftertaste
Specific DHA and EPA content is not on the label

customer_reviews.title: The only kind I will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: These fish oil pills have been a staple in my medicine cabinet. They are easy to swallow and I never ever taste or burp up any fish flavor. The capsule are large but go down without a problem this is my go to fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Best Price I Could Find on High Omega 3 Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: I take this stuff because of the Omega 3s, knowing that there are some negative things written about where fish oil comes from and what it does to your system. I have MS, however, so Omega 3s are essential to me. Why do I buy this one? It seems to be of okay quality and the price is the best I can find. It's that simple.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Not so fishy for fish oil
customer_reviews.text: Like all fish oil supplements seem to be, these are huge pills. But once you choke it down, it doesn't seem to cause "fish burps" or general body odor or anything negative. I feel like I maybe swim faster now too.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: you need to take 2-3 a day
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted a fish oil that you took only one capsule a day. these are large pills and I first saw he one capsule but then above it says to take 2-3 a day. I try and take the fish oil first to make sure it doesn't get stuck. As if I don't i taste the capsule. I wouldn't have ordered them if I had known I had to take more than one. I 'm taking one in the morning and one at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee P. Swain

customer_reviews.title: Isn't worth the money to me. It has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Isn't worth the money to me. It has a lot of filler fish oil for such a large pill. It is half the price of Omegavia, but in the end has less omega 3's in it that you would have to take three in order to get the equivalent of one Omegavia. I prefer not to take a bunch of pills throughout the day so to me the extra cost of Omegavia was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KkOk123

customer_reviews.title: Happy Heart
customer_reviews.text: I feel better with taking these daily. My triglycerides were through the roof and since taking these, they have reduced greatly into normal levels.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Tioran

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great product in a nice container
customer_reviews.text: Fish Oil has many benefits. Here are some. Lower blood pressure Reduce triglycerides Slow the development of plaque in the arteries Reduce the chance of abnormal heart rhythm Reduce the likelihood of heart attack and stroke Lessen the chance of sudden cardiac death in people with heart disease I take this to keep my heart healthy. So far so good. Great product in a nice container.
customer_reviews.author: rocky ramirez

customer_reviews.title: How bad is the stink from these capsules...?
customer_reviews.text: The stink is SO BAD, it rubs off on my hands and won't wash off. I use daily dispensers for my supplements, one for each day. Once a week I load them up, but I've had to use kitchen tongs to put each of these capsules into the individual slots. If I don't, then my hands smell just disgusting all day long, no matter how many times I wash them. Every bite of food I bring to my mouth for the rest of the day stinks of fish. I'm too frugal to just toss the whole bottle away. But I've finally used them up --hooray!! I will never, ever buy these again. Pee-yoo-ey!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: The pills are really huge
customer_reviews.text: I stopped taking these as the pills are large in size. You also have to take them 3 times daily. I rated it 3 stars because they do offer a good source of fish oil, unfortunately though I have opted out.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So my hair grew tremendously- I used different hair products in a past (hair masks, ampules, all types of treatments) but the only real result that I saw is after I started taking Fish oil supplements- I receive complements about my hair daily!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kharlanova

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product. I take Fish Oil Regularly and believe in it's health benefits and my regular type was out so I ordered these. Love the price. No Fishy burps or fishy taste from taking it which is the thing I am most concerned about in Fish Oil products. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have seen the difference on my body, I feel better, with more energy and my memory has improved
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nature''s Bounty Fish Oil-- no unpleasant odor at all, and this is a tremendous value!
customer_reviews.author: M. McCain

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to report that these have been fish-burp free.. for me anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't realized when I ordered these that they weren't enteric coated so was a bit worried when they arrived that I'd have fishy burps upon taking them. I'm happy to report that these have been fish-burp free.. for me anyway. Good fish oil's. No negative effects... I like the brand, and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lead Singer

customer_reviews.title: Suppose to be good for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order today. A rheumatologist told me to take 6,000mg of fish oil a day 3 1,000 mg in the morning and 3 1,000 at night since these are 1,200 mg I will take 3 in the morning and 2 at night, 500 mg of Tumeric twice a day, Vitamin D and 1 shot of tart cherry juice from concentrate twice a day one in the morning and one at night for joint pain. Going to try this to see if all these combinations work. The bottle is huge and will last 40 days which is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Holley

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time and has great effects on my hair and nails!
customer_reviews.author: malia

customer_reviews.title: Gross odor!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking fish oil for many years, and have never come across a bottle of fish oil that stunk so badly of rotten fish. The price was right, but probably not worth it in the end. I’ve tried putting them in the refrigerator to see if maybe that helps. Although I’ve never had to do this with previous products. I have another bottle coming through subscribe and save, hoping it was just a fluke with this bottle. If not, both bottles are going back! Disgusting! Ooh, ooh that smell!6Ooh that smell!)
customer_reviews.author: BfloGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was advised by rheumatologist, that fish oil will improve arthritic condition in my knees. Been taking this product for many years. Look for double-blind evidence based studies for confirmation before going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Triglyceride Formula, Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Triglyceride formula for a VERY reasonable price. Only four stars because they only have 360 epa/dha as compared to the other triglyceride options. With Prime, they come out to only 5 cents each. That's about 15 cents for 1,000 epa/dha vs. 32 cents for NN equivalent dose. These are not enteric coated for "fish burp" protection. That being said, i have experienced ZERO discomfort and fishiness like i did with Nature Made non coated.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TRANSACTION
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction. Awesome product, really-really works! On my second bottle and will continue to use in my daily vitamin regimen, highly recommended. Top-Notch seller the order was received on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELICA

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: The Kirkland brand is less expensive and equal in quality. If you take alot of fish oil buy kirkland.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Huge Huge Huge Pills
customer_reviews.text: These are the biggest pills I have ever seen. I am seriously afraid that I would choke if I took them, so for this reason alone back they go !!
customer_reviews.author: YellowBug

customer_reviews.title: Good for thyroid control? It help me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried using it to improve my thyroid.it seems to help a lot.my dr.took me off the mefs.but i started having the chills at night.taking this made it fine again.
customer_reviews.author: a boyscout

customer_reviews.title: NO fishy aftertaste! NO complaints!
customer_reviews.text: If someone NEAR us in a restaurant orders fish, my husband usually can’t finish his OWN meal because the smell of seafood wafting over to our table is so overwhelming to him. He won’t eat seafood, and he absolutely loathes the smell of it too! So when I bought these fish oil pills to help lower his cholesterol, I was WORRIED that he wouldn’t even give them a try. ... But that was a total waste of worry! He’s been taking these pills all week (twice a day) with NO COMPLAINTS and so have I. NO FISHY AFTERTASTE whatsoever! I am SO relieved!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Big pills with bigger benefits ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow but beware they're big! I'm a pill pro (😂) so I don't have an issue, but it is important to note. I haven't noticed any ouward benefits but I know my body is happy with fish oil since I'm vegetarian and need a few special supplements :) great value for the price - great to add to your morning routine!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFangirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I take this product for at least 2 years in a row and totally recommend it. It’s quite big to be swallowed (which is not a problem for me), but the soft consistency makes it easier. I usually take it together or after meals because on empty stomach later on it can bring a bad flavor to your mouth. I feel no pain and I’m sure it contributes a lot to my general health quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you want a lot of omega 3
customer_reviews.text: Low amounts of the actual fatty acids you want read label
customer_reviews.author: John M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I take them for cramps
customer_reviews.text: I take these to help control cramps after reading about how omega-3s can help with excess prostaglandins. It seems to work. I had a lot pf pain relief after taking them for a month. From what I’m reading, it should take more like 2 months to really be effective, but I’ve been taking 2 a day instead of 1. Still, my June cycle will be telling, I suppose. But so far, so good. There’s maybe a tiny bit of fishiness a little while after I take them. Not very noticeable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmie

customer_reviews.title: Be your dad
customer_reviews.text: Very much fish oil pills. My dad's been taking these for as long as I can remember, and now that I've grown into a man I must follow suit
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for maintaining a healthy heart. Have seen a lot of heart related deaths among young people lately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most recent order was extremely rancid
customer_reviews.text: I take high dose fish oil, which can be of great benefit especially for certain conditions. I am willing to compromise on quality to get my mega dose. This stuff is alright. Better than Walmart brand, a little. However, my most recent purchase was disgustingly rancid. I don’t know if it’s healthy for me to be taking it so spoiled. Just inconsistent quality control. I’m bet this crap sat in a hot warehouse or in the back of some shipping truck for 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Regan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. It's very easy to swallow and is high in content compared to other fish oils. I noticed a significant difference in my joint pain after a few days taking this 3 times daily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric James

customer_reviews.title: No added bs, no fishy burps
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a different brand from Amazon that was falsely advertised, had a bunch of other ingredients besides fish oil, and gave me bad fishy burps. This product however comes as advertised, is nothing but fish oil (with documented sourcing) and doesn't make me burp at all. Definitely worth it to spend a bit more and get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: John MD

customer_reviews.title: Size Huge.  Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Size is huge - is it visible on bottle online?/should be- see picture its over an inch/gag. I use For health supplement It works well This time could not get the seal off which usually pulls easily. Not this time had to get sharp pointed knife to puncture thru and cut around- and still difficult to pull off. Guess my main concern is tampering possible. Will wait to hear back before taking
customer_reviews.author: Sharon, Olney, MD

customer_reviews.title: Fishy power, Aquaman in Real Life!!
customer_reviews.text: These fish supplements are life savers! Inexpensive for so many of them. They are smooth capsules and very easy to swallow. I already feel the effects of the fish powers after only a few months. My skin feels healthier! But don’t worry, I haven’t grown scales... yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this product
customer_reviews.text: We've found buying Nature's Bounty through Amazon offers a better deal than anywhere else. Not only that, but the product is top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it asks for a rating for pain relief. This is not for that purpose. This product is one if the few fish oil supplements that verifies that the Omega 3 is directly from natural triglycerides. Others are not. This allows these to be more effective and easily absorbed by your system. This has helped me a great deal. I take one in the morning and one at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for less than a month so the jury is out whether they are doing much or not. In any case, the price was right, they showed up on time with no damage. Although they shipped during a very hot time, they all seem fine;nothing melted or anything which is good. I'll most likely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My sleep is not the greatest. Read that fish oil can help balance hormones to sleep better. I use it daily and believe my sleep has improved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good... but not coated
customer_reviews.text: The image on the bottle says ‘Coated’, meaning that they have an enteric coating so that they will digest on the small intestine, thus better absorption. But the bottle I received says ‘Rapid Release’ instead, so it’s a bit deceptive. Otherwise it seems like good fish oil... I have always been happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement and pictures of bottle showed this product was tested by an independent lab as all vitamins and minerals should. The bottle I received only noted "laboratory tested". Who's laboratory? Their own? Not good enough for me. I will order from a different manufacturer next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Been very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Been very happy with these. I was really concerned about the after taste or any fishy burps. I have been using these for a year now and never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: cramblda

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant women must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking since second trimester and now I’m on third trimester, those are good for baby’s brain growth they say. I can’t always eat fish(since lots of them have mercury and can’t eat it raw as well) this is a good source of DHA and EPA. I will keep taking those even after baby is born!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Big pills, but otherwise okay in moderation
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grad student who has a hard time getting omega-3s into my diet. These pills helped a lot, but you do need to take them after eating (on a full stomach) - I got stomach aches otherwise. They are also fairly large pills (look like a size 000 at first glance), so if you have problems swallowing pills then this is not for you. Other than that they're pretty good - just make sure to read the instructions and not over do your omega-3 intake.
customer_reviews.author: Eva de la Serna

customer_reviews.title: Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: One of the more economical fish oil products on Amazon. We take it as part of preventive maintenance. No foul taste or odor.
customer_reviews.author: Shimz

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Bottle! Great Results!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how big the bottle was when I ordered, but it came in and I was very surprised. I ordered this at doctor recommendation to help with my triglycerides, as the medication I’m taking tends to raise them. It worked like a charm, very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I feel less pain in my knees
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not they say Omega-3 fish pills are a powerful anti-inflammatory and indeed within the first few days I swear I felt less pain in my knees, I have chronic knee pain, and I swear I feel I have more energy throughout the day time,I've now been taking these pills for a few weeks and I don't think it's placebo my knees definitely feel better. But I must add I'm not just taking these pills I'm also eating fish sticks almost every day as well. I think the hype behind Omega-3 might be legitimate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I take them as directed and they work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for years and years, i honestly don't know how my body will react without them. I take them as directed and they work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karena's Favorites

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like these! They are pretty large, but they don't have a bad flavor, and we don't have an issue swallowing, but take note just in case you struggle with larger pills/supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: but I don't think it's nearly as bad now that I've been using them for a while
customer_reviews.text: The smell was rather overpowering the very first time I opened the bottle, but I don't think it's nearly as bad now that I've been using them for a while. There is not after taste or burping after I take them. The capsules are large but go down smoothly/easily.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Good for you .
customer_reviews.text: Made you skin feel fabulous. Moisturize your skin help with your inmune system you get less sick. Very good for you. The only down size is that dont state if have mercury in the consumption of the olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: I'm still alive
customer_reviews.text: I'm still alive. That's right... it has not killed me or gotten me sick. I hope it is doing something good for me. Honestly, I added this to my Amazon "Subscribe and Save" just so I could get the 15% off of other items in my 5-item-ship-together-deal. :)
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Pitiful amounts of Omega-3
customer_reviews.text: I take Omega-3 supplements for my chronic dry eyes, and for months I was wondering what had happened that caused my condition to suddenly start getting worse. Eventually I tracked it down to the fact that I switched from my previous Omega-3 supplements to these suckers: despite the recommended serving of thrice per day, and the pills being gargantuan, they still manage to have less Omega-3 than more expensive competitors. Be forewarned that if you go with these you're gonna have to go way over the recommended amount if you want to match what you'd get out of alternative brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nate K.

customer_reviews.title: It makes you HUNGRY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. Just a few things to mention: 1. It makes you extremely HUNGRY! I’m guessing this is the usual with most vitamins. 2. The pill is large but extremely easy to swallow. You also burp the scent of the fish oil. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cleopatra Mason

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Omega 6 & 3 Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: The GREATEST fish/omega 3 oil we've ever taken. If you're in the market for this type of supplementation, you've hit the lottery with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog and definitely feel like her coat has gotten softer and she never itches anymore. We give her 2 pills in the morning with her food and she gobbles them up. She is 40lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin n for the whole Family
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Beats store prices even with 2 for 1. My whole family takes it even our dog. Keeps her paws and skin shinny and paws soft.
customer_reviews.author: hopester2

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective, poor quality, contains very little Omega-3, does not specify the amounts of EPA & DHA
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective, poor quality, contains very little Omega-3, does not specify the amounts of EPA & DHA.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product uses multiple different Fish sources for the oil. These pills are still large. Easily swallowed with water. I have not had any "Fish Burps" either.
customer_reviews.author: CASMAN71

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat these Fish Oil pills !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for these fish oil pills. The pills are VERY large and coated and they have no after taste. We got 200 pills for under $14. Great Deal !!!
customer_reviews.author: @audraschaney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Melted Twice.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived melted twice. Don’t order during the summer months unless you want a bottle of fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy  to take
customer_reviews.text: I like these capsules. I only need to take one a day. No fishy taste or indigestion. Just one a day makes it pretty economical. I think that it is a Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of allergies. This fishoil doesn't set of any of them - some of the other brands cause very bad reactions in me. Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Puffini

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand to I know exactly what I am getting from this company
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to swallow! I will say that there is a fishy taste if you were to burp (sorry!), but that’s how a majority of fish oils are. Other than that, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Large pills but easy to swallow since gel coated. No aftertaste fishy burps. Convenient one pill daily. Have been taking consistently over 3 months now once daily.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Correia

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Im disapointed. These arrived super hot from the weather. Hot fish oil is no good.So i had to throw them out. So if you live in a sunny state..dont order these!
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper. 😃
customer_reviews.text: Have been using fish oil for years. Good to find such a large bottle of 200 rapid released soft gels. For such a reasonable price. More than please thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is all right. Pills can smell a little fishy compared to another brand I bought in the past but I guess at least for me it is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe What

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I do CrossFit, and that can be a real strain on the joints. Cleans, squats, etc. This is one of the things keeping me off the injured list.
customer_reviews.author: I. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Fishy burps.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like these. The pills are huge, your burps taste like fish the entire day, and the recommended does on the bottle seems excessive. I don't know what I'm going to do with the rest of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: No strong fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: I take 4 a day, per my doctor. No strong taste. No bad breath. And best of all ... my fish no longer squeak. (humor)
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: The fish content used is NOT good for GOUT! and...............
customer_reviews.text: The fish content of ANCHOVIES,SARDINES used is NOT good for GOUT! I had to receive refund- I have GOUT!

customer_reviews.title: Important heart health supplement
customer_reviews.text: Used as a daily regimen for circulatory/heart health and maintain healthy cholesterol levels. No aftertaste, easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good for you..take daily
customer_reviews.text: Fish oil is good for the heart. No taste. Didn't know it helps with pain relief. I have high cholesterol and can't handle the stains.
customer_reviews.author: waynenorwoodjr

customer_reviews.title: No Fishy Burps
customer_reviews.text: They work and I've never had a fishy burp after taking these capsules. That's more than I can say for some other brands I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: I believe they are good...but really, how do you tell?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow and leave no bad fishy aftertaste. Effective? How do you really tell? I hope they are...
customer_reviews.author: Maverick One

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with taking fish oil, and can't go wrong with Nature's Bounty.
customer_reviews.author: SweetTart

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. I have never had that "fishy after taste" I have seen others talk about. Bottle said to take 3 per day.

customer_reviews.title: Not show the amount of dha and epa
customer_reviews.text: On the label on the bottle does not show the amount of cha or EPA in which both of them should add more than 800

customer_reviews.author: Brian and Shawna Dorner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality product at a good price. It does not cause nasty fish burps like some others I've tried in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Probably important to take
customer_reviews.text: I keep thinking all these oils and creams will make me look younger and I guess they really don’t but I do think fish oil makes your skin look and feel better

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This fish oil in particular has the worst taste and smell of any i have taken, wont buy again. Zero pain relief

customer_reviews.text: Very large pills but I think most omega 3 / Fish oil is large pills. They are actually gel tabs. It's all good though.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just started to use so I will use for a month or two to see if I see any changes
customer_reviews.author: Elvira H

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: My doctor said I needed to use fish oil. So I orders this. Happy with this item.

customer_reviews.title: Large capsules
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge bottle as are the fish oil capsules as well. I actually bought the wrong type but we're taking it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Good product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get these for pain relief. My son insisted I get them for my heart. Great price. Good product.

customer_reviews.title: Multi capsules needed to get dose
customer_reviews.text: This capsule is huge, and it turned out you had to take 3 or 4 a day. Yikes.
customer_reviews.author: twokniveskatie

customer_reviews.title: I always buy this brand of fish oil. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this brand of fish oil. It's inexpensive and I know it works I can tell the difference when I don't take it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Veretto

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the liquid gel form. I was expecting to be burping up a fish taste cause other people said they do with their supplements. I HAVE NOT had any issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fish oil I ever had. No after taste easy to swallow. I take it and also I give one capsule to my dogs everyday
customer_reviews.author: susana jennings

customer_reviews.title: Take em
customer_reviews.text: No fishy taste. Not sure if it’s helping but doc says take it. Pills are big but easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: For my pups
customer_reviews.text: These are actually for my pitbulls. Their fur is so soft snd shiny. My boy has skin allergies and dry skin and this has helped him immensely
customer_reviews.author: cyz mtrz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Gave me heart palpations, doctor told me to never take another pill
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a normal every day supplement. Saved money on these vs at the store
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: HELP....empty package!
customer_reviews.text: I received an unsealed package....flat....never an item placed in it!
customer_reviews.author: vegaslady

customer_reviews.title: Change formula
customer_reviews.text: Something has changed with this fish oil, in the most recent product I've received it has a fishy small/taste to it whereas before it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Will definitely be a repeat customer. Doesn’t taste like fish either
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Evans

product_meta.title: Nature's Bounty Fish Oil 1200 mg Omega-3, Heart Health, 200 Rapid Release Softgels
product_meta.description: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Contains (1) bottle of 200 rapid release 1200 milligram fish oil supplement soft gels, each containing 360 milligram of Omega 3. Nature's Bounty Fish Oil 1200 milligram contains EPA and DHA

Quality, consistency and scientific research has resulted in vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence. Using the latest breakthroughs in nutritional science & the finest ingredients, we provide supplements of unsurpassed quality & value

Every Nature‚Äôs Bounty product is subjected to numerous quality tests throughout the manufacturing process to verify purity and potency. The ingredients & final product are tested in our microbiological laboratory to make certain that the product is pure
